    \index{nMOLDYN \textit{(package)}!nMOLDYN.GUI \textit{(package)}!nMOLDYN.GUI.ViewEffectiveModeDialog \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module nMOLDYN.GUI.ViewEffectiveModeDialog}

    \label{nMOLDYN:GUI:ViewEffectiveModeDialog}
\begin{alltt}
This modules implements I\{View --{\textgreater} Effective Mode\} dialog.

Classes:
    * ViewEffectiveModeDialog: creates I\{View --{\textgreater} Effective Mode\} dialog used to 
      view an animation of the effective modes resulting from a Quasi Harmonic Analysis.
\end{alltt}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                           Class Description                           %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

&&
  \\
&&&&&&\multicolumn{2}{l}{\textbf{nMOLDYN.GUI.ViewEffectiveModeDialog.ViewEffectiveModeDialog}}
\end{tabular}

Sets up a dialog used to visualize the effective modes resulting from a QHA
analysis.
